an5.264:1.1: “Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an5.264:1.3: Avasamacchariyam, kulamacchariyam, labhamacchariyam, vannamacchariyam, akatannutam akataveditam.
an5.264:1.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamme appahaya abhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an5.264:2.1: Pancime, bhikkhave, dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitum.
an5.264:2.3: Avasamacchariyam, kulamacchariyam, labhamacchariyam, vannamacchariyam, akatannutam akataveditam.
an5.264:2.4: Ime kho, bhikkhave, panca dhamme pahaya bhabbo pathamam jhanam upasampajja viharitun”ti.
